sentences: Jason Pierce is a Canadian drummer, currently the drummer of the Canadian band Our Lady Peace since 2016.
During the 2000s, Pierce was a member of the Canadian band The Weekend.
In 2012, Pierce performed drums on the Evans Blue album Graveyard of Empires.
In 2014, while in search of a replacement drummer, Our Lady Peace enlisted Pierce to perform during live shows.
In 2016, he officially joined the band as their full-time drummer.
